# speeds

**Instance Property**

A list of user-selectable playback speeds to show in the playback speed control.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var speeds: [AVPlaybackSpeed] { get set }
```

## Discussion

By default, this property value equals [doc://com.apple.avkit/documentation/AVKit/AVPlaybackSpeed/systemDefaultSpeeds]. Setting this property to an empty array hides the playback speed selection user interface.

To set the playback speed programmatically, call the [doc://com.apple.avkit/documentation/AVKit/AVPlayerViewController/selectSpeed(_:)] method, or set the value of the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayer/defaultRate] property on the view controller’s associated player object.

## Configuring playback speed

- **selectedSpeed**: The currently selected playback speed.
- **selectSpeed(_:)**: Selects a specified playback speed.
- **AVPlaybackSpeed**: An object that represents a user-selectable playback speed in a playback user interface.
